content: the pattern is available free for a limited time ________________________________________________ this is the chunky version of watch house /patterns/library/watch-house it works well with a single skein of vientos /yarns/library/malabrigo-yarn-vientos or uses just half a skein of mamie and florrie mega mohair yarn but you can substitute any yarn with which you can get gauge **erratum** - p2tog stands for **purl** 2 stitches together this has been corrected in the latest version feb 4th
